definition: arrow/dart/straight/to vow/to swear/old variant of 屎[shi3]
same as 逶 in 逶迤 winding, curved
to entrust/to cast aside/to shift (blame etc)/to accumulate/roundabout/winding/dejected/listless/committee member/council/end/actually/certainly
a person of short stature/a short person

sentences.english: Competition on growth between Juncellus serotinus and Sagittaria pygmaea was evident.
sentences.chinese: 水莎草与矮慈姑两种杂草间也存在生态竞争关系。

sentences.english: Most citizens of that little-known tribe are manikins .
sentences.chinese: 那个鲜为人知的部落的大部分居民都是小矮人。

sentences.english: Where once he looked roly-poly, he suddenly appeared in public with a normal build.
sentences.chinese: 他以前又矮又胖，却突然以正常体形出现在大家眼前。

sentences.english: Pluto is now considered a dwarf planet dwelling in the Kuiper belt.
sentences.chinese: 冥王星现在被认定为一颗处于柯伊伯带中的矮行星。

sentences.english: A sturdy, low shoe that laces over the instep.
sentences.chinese: 一种结实的脚背上系脚带的矮鞋。

sentences.english: Gobinda Babu of our school was very dark, and short and fat.
sentences.chinese: 我们学校的戈文达先生是一位皮肤黝黑的矮胖子。

sentences.english: Common low European shrub with purple-red flowers.
sentences.chinese: 欧洲普通的矮灌木，有紫红色的花。

sentences.english: How can you say this tree is small and that tree big?
sentences.chinese: 你怎么能说，这棵树矮那棵树高？

sentences.english: Ever wonder how dwarves see so well in their caverns?
sentences.chinese: 可曾好奇矮人们在他们的洞穴里如何看得那么清楚？

sentences.english: This tree is twice as short as that one.
sentences.chinese: 这棵树比那棵树矮一倍。

sentences.english: Short the distinctive atmosphere that couchant placement adds emperor city for the space.
sentences.chinese: 矮蹲的放置为空间增添皇城的独特气氛。

sentences.english: How will I finally be returning' ta me beloved dwarven homelands?
sentences.chinese: 俺最后会怎么回到俺心爱着的矮人家乡？

sentences.english: I am neaten the books on the low bookshelf.
sentences.chinese: 我正在整理矮书架上的书。

sentences.english: He was a massive black giant and I was a pudgy little redhead.
sentences.chinese: 他是个大黑块头，而我是个红头发的小矮胖子。

sentences.english: Old bits of dangerously frayed rope hung from some of the more accessible greenery.
sentences.chinese: 严重磨损的绳索挂在一些较矮的树上。

sentences.english: The bones reveal that women were sometimes fatter in relation to their height than men.
sentences.chinese: 有时女人比男人显得胖一些，因为她们较矮，却体宽。

definition: a person of short stature/a short person
